author: Danielle Andres
title: Danielle Andres
text:
The lady I bought this hurricane for is very grateful and is working with a physical therapist on the best way to use the the cane.
She is happy to be able to function again. She is 85 and fell too many times. I'm not a relative, just a good friend!ðŸ˜€
